name: Mad Cash Fo' Dash
description:
*Let it LOAD for ~10s if it hangs, Apologies!*

Mad Dash Fo' Cash is an endless-runner game that depicts the dynamic nature of an economy through procedural generation of the terrain. Interaction with bulls and bears will simulate the highs and lows of the market. As the player climbs the graph, it gets harder over time to maintain a positive quarterly income that contributes to revenue, which represents the player's score at the end of the game! Good luck fighting the bears and bulls of the Economy!!!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/maddashfocash/?fref=ts
*PC Standalone and Android APK Download Links here*

This is done as a short-project on Singapore's DBS Game Jam 15. If you like the game, do vote for us by liking the Facebook image below:
https://www.facebook.com/dbsremix/photos/a.1011869862188245.1073741827.116510905057483/1011869978854900/?type=3&theater
All votes are sincerely appreciated!
